data.name: I Was Wrong
data.detailed_description:
I Was Wrong is about admit your mistakes.

The Game is a gorgeous short (half hour) exploration game, focused in tell the story of brilliant man, who ended up trapped inside his own mind. A man who decided waste his last months of life trying to avoid the inevitable.
Now he needs to escape from his mind, but the only way is follow a strange female voice while he tries to remember important things by reading messages in old fashion monitors. Could you help him to avoid his fears (some creatures) and remember some important informations about his life?

The game offers some items to find, places to explore, lore to discover and a beatiful sunset to enjoy.

Important

This is a short exploration game (about a half hour)!

data.short_description: A gorgeous short exploration game, focused in tell the story of brilliant man, who ended up trapped inside his own mind. He needs to escape from his mind, but the only way is follow a strange female voice while he tries to remember important things by reading messages in old monitors.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 / Radeon R7 260X with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
